name: Tank Battle (Luminight)
description:
Play with your friend as tanks and try to explode eachother.  A small hobby project made using PICO-8.

The project is still in development, and will be released soon :)

The game functions really well currently, and there are some powerups too (speed, bullet cd decrease)

Planned features:

  • More maps!
  • More powerups!!!
  • Options menu
    • Powerups ON/OFF
    • Other customizations
  • 1 player mode (Either 1 ai, or the same as Battle City)
    • Either one player is controlled by an AI or the same thing Battle City had
    • Possibly will be a different build
